General.Name: Bald Eagle Gold Corp
General.Description: Hercules Silver Corp., a junior mining company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of resource properties in the United States. The company explores for silver, lead, and zinc deposits. Its flagship property is 100% owned Hercules Silver Project located in Washington County, Idaho. The company was formerly known as Bald Eagle Gold Corp. and changed its name to Hercules Silver Corp. in August 2022. Hercules Silver Corp. is headquartered in Kelowna, Canada.
General.Address: 100 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5X 1G5
